official.headline: Directorate Leader Passes
official.anchor_line: Authorities confirm the passing of Central Oversight head Marek Halden.
official.contextual_reframing: System continuity protocols ensure uninterrupted city services. The Council highlights Halden's role in advancing Stenograd’s unified infrastructure.

official.headline: Seamless Services Continue
official.anchor_line: Enhanced infrastructure management protocols keep all major systems stable.
official.contextual_reframing: Automated frameworks uphold stability citywide, reflecting the strength and efficiency of Stenograd’s governance model.

underground.headline: Halden Dead—No Answers
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd's system chief Halden found dead—no explanation, no replacement, no closure.
underground.contextual_reframing: Council silent and files sealed. Was it cardiac arrest, or something they don't want us to see?

underground.headline: City Glitches Spike
underground.anchor_line: Sudden delays and system errors hit daily life right after Halden's death.
underground.contextual_reframing: Automated controls are failing—shows how much power one man really had. So much for perfect order.
